name: Selena S. Butler Park
description: Selena S. Butler Park is a 4 acre park in Old Fourth Ward that was renovated in 2011. It has 2 tennis courts, a basketball court, a playground, a multi-purpose field and a picnic/grill area.
parking: There is a small parking lot at the center of the park next to the recreation center. There is also street parking along William Holmes Borders Senior Dr.
